name: One Click Complete Backups By Maida Themes
author: Adnan Hyder Pervez

sections.description:
This plugin helps in managing your WordPress website’s backups.
You can easily download , or create complete multiple backups.

Plugin Features
Some extra features are provided such as:

  • clear instructions.

  • zip extension readable by many servers.

Say thanks to me for more help in documentation https://xpertcodes.com

or you can email me as well 12345adnan@gmail.com

How to use it

  1. Install the plugin
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Navigate to ONE CLICK Backups in admin menus
  4. Click Take Backup and that’s it you don’t need to wait until backup is done you can do what ever you want once backup is completed it shows on same page as old backup latest one on the top.
  5. Click on the link shown in old backups to download
  6. if you want to remove backup click on remove backup button next to link
  7. prerequisite your server should have space to save total size of backup

Shortcode

In case of any difficulties in setting up your plugin, write an email to 12345adnan@gmail.com
sections.faq:
How to make backup?

Navigate to ONE CLICK Backups in admin menus , Click Take Backup and that’s it you don’t need to wait until backup is done you can do what ever you want once backup is completed it shows on same page as old backup latest one on the top.

Can it take database backup ?

Yes.

My files size are so big?

It will take time.

Do plugin Author have access to my backup?

No.

Where backup is stored?

backup is stored on your server.

short_description: This plugin allows the end user to take wordpress backup and download backup in one click including database.
